Text: Happening now in Hebron, Israeli settlers are attacking Palestinian houses by throwing stones and empty beer bottles.

Happening now in Hebron 11 pm, Israeli Jewish settlers are stealing Palestinian olives, the Israeli army few days ago prevented the Palestinian families from picking their olives. Now the settlers stole it .
Our daily life under the Israeli occupation and apartheid.

Democrats lost the 2024 election because of 
@POTUS
 and his team blind support to the Israeli war and genocide. 
It is the time for the democrats to act according to their principles and values and stop the blind support to the Israeli racism and genocide.
The Israeli settlers stole my house CCTV camera again and again, each new camera they come and steal it, the Israel soldiers see them stealing but do nothing to stop them.

Today the Israeli military detained and interrogated 22 Palestinians in Dura city next to Hebron, the detainees were labeled  by drawing numbers on their foreheads, the Israeli army used their numbers as identification, 
It is more than occupation, it is fascizim

Today is Shabbat , Israeli Jewish settlers attacked a Palestinian family during the olives harvest in Hebron , they stole the olives & sheets which the family use to pick the olives. Soldiers did nothing to stop them.
Israeli Jewish settlers don’t represent the Jews in the world.

Thursday, October 17th , all the checkpoints in Hebron are closed for the Palestinian people because of the Jewish holiday #sukkot2024 , we are not allowed to leave out or in our houses. No schools no jobs no life . It is racism and apartheid not security to anyone .

A video shows the moment Israeli occupation forces murdered 15-year-old Rayan Al-Sayed in Jenin yesterday.
It is the orders of the national security minister in Israel who is infamous of his support of this type of killings.

A Year of Israel’s Genocide and the Collapse of World Order. 
Stand up now before it is too late to do so.

Leaked video shows Israeli occupation soldiers mentally and physically torturing Palestinian civilians arrested from the occupied west bank, lying on the ground and on the stones, While the Israeli soldier seemingly reading the Jewish Torah book and provoking them.

In Hebron today , the Israeli army closed the main checkpoint, the teachers and the students were not able to reach their school on time.
It is daily harassment’s without any excuse, it is happening because it is occupation and apartheid.

Congratulations to 2024 #RightLivelihood Laureate, 
@Issaamro
/
@YASHebron
, leaders in the non-violent movement against Israeli occupation in the West Bank.

The treatment of the Palestinians at the Israeli checkpoints in Hebron.

During the Israeli War on Gaza, Israeli military is busy to demolish Palestinian homes in West Bank and to encourage the Israeli settlers to violently attack Palestinians.

The Israeli military beat up my dear Friend Mohammad Al- Natsheh, they detained him for hours then beat him up without any reason.
I wish all my American friends a happy Independence Day, I wish that one day  the American administration stops its blind support to the Israeli occupation and apartheid.
Happening now , Israeli settlers are throwing stones toward Palestinian shops and customers in Hebron market. The military post is few meters from the location of the stones throwing.
Watch the video which shows Israeli  soldiers in Hebron throwing  3 Palestinian cars to the valley, the cars were confiscated by the soldiers under the excuse  that it is not legal cars.
My friend Bassem Tamimi  is released now from Israeli jail.

Happening now: Israeli settlers stole my metal water tanks , I usually save water in the tanks in order to use it later because we have shortage of water , Israeli government steals our water , and Israeli settlers steal our water tanks .
Israel is apartheid state .

Happening now: Israeli settler destroyed my house wall, the Israeli soldier did nothing to stop him.
The Israeli police will do nothing to make him accountable.
